action.string: Execute this behavior tree just above MoveAwayFromTarget. Be sure to set dontTargetCreeps to yes if your bot is trying to get a kill. It resets each tick.

andblock.string: Prevents getting stuck at the platforms above the first top turrets on Ribbit
